   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssh_sup_SUITE).
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("ssh.hrl").
   25: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([suite/0,
   28:          all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   36: 
   37: -export([default_tree/1,
   38:          killed_acceptor_restarts/1,
   39:          shell_channel_tree/1,
   40:          sshc_subtree/1,
   41:          sshd_subtree/1,
   42:          sshd_subtree_profile/1]).
   43: 
   44: -define(USER, "Alladin").
   45: -define(PASSWD, "Sesame").
   46: 
   47: -define(WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN, 500).
   48: 
   49: -define(SSHC_SUP(Pid), {sshc_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   50: -define(SSHD_SUP(Pid), {sshd_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   51: -define(SYSTEM_SUP(Pid,Address),
   52:         {{ssh_system_sup, Address}, Pid, supervisor,[ssh_system_sup]}).
   53: -define(CONNECTION_SUP(Pid), {_,Pid, supervisor,[ssh_connection_sup]}).
   54: -define(ACCEPTOR_SUP(Pid,Address),
   55:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,supervisor,[ssh_acceptor_sup]}).
   56: -define(ACCEPTOR_WORKER(Pid,Address),
   57:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,worker,[ssh_acceptor]}).
   58: 
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: suite() ->
   63:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   64:      {timetrap,{seconds,100}}].
   65: 
   66: all() ->
   67:     [default_tree, sshc_subtree, sshd_subtree, sshd_subtree_profile,
   68:      killed_acceptor_restarts, shell_channel_tree].
   69: 
   70: groups() ->
   71:     [].
   72: 
   73: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   81:        begin
   82: 	   PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   83: 	   UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
   84: 	   file:make_dir(UserDir),
   85: 	   [{userdir, UserDir} | Config]
   86:        end).
   87: 
   88: end_per_suite(_) ->
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: init_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
   92:     ssh:start(),
   93:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   94:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
   95:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
   96:                                              {user_passwords,
   97:                                               [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
   98:     [{server, {Pid, Host, Port}} | Config];
   99: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  100:     end_per_testcase(Case, Config),
  101:     ssh:start(),
  102:     Config.
  103: end_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
  104:     {Pid,_,_} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  105:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  106:     ssh:stop();
  107: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
  108:     ssh:stop().
  109: 
  110: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: %% Test cases
  112: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: default_tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  114:     TopSupChildren = supervisor:which_children(ssh_sup),
  115:     2 = length(TopSupChildren),
  116:     {value, ?SSHC_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshc_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  117:     {value, ?SSHD_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshd_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  118:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  119:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  120: 
  121: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  122: sshc_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  124:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  125:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  126:     Pid1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  127:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  128:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  129:                                              {user, ?USER},
  130:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  131:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  132:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup)],
  133: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup),
  134:                 [ConnectionSup]),
  135:     check_sshc_system_tree(ConnectionSup, Pid1, Config),
  136:     Pid2 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  137:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  138:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  139:                                              {user, ?USER},
  140:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  141:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  142:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(_),
  143:                  ?CONNECTION_SUP(_)
  144:                 ],
  145: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  146:     ssh:close(Pid1),
  147:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(_)
  148:                 ],
  149: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  150:     ssh:close(Pid2),
  151:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)).
  152: 
  153: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  154: sshd_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  156:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  157:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  158:                                                   {user_passwords,
  159:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
  160:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Daemon]),
  161:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  162:                                               port=Port,
  163:                                               profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE})],
  164: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  165: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  166:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  167:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  168:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port),
  169:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  170:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  171: 
  172: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  173: sshd_subtree_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  175:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  176:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  177:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  178:                                                   {user_passwords,
  179:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  180:                                                   {profile, Profile}]),
  181:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Profile=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Profile,Daemon]),
  182:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  183:                                               port=Port,
  184:                                               profile=Profile})],
  185: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  186: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  187:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  188:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  189:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port, Profile),
  190:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  191:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  192: 
  193: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  194: killed_acceptor_restarts(Config) ->
  195:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  196:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  197:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  198:     {ok, DaemonPid} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  199:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  200:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  201:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  202: 
  203:     {ok, DaemonPid2} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  204:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  205:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  206:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  207: 
  208:     Port  = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid),
  209:     Port2 = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid2),
  210:     true = (Port /= Port2),
  211: 
  212:     {ok,[{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  213:     {ok,[{AccPid2,ListenAddr,Port2}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid2),
  214: 
  215:     true = (AccPid /= AccPid2),
  216: 
  217:     %% Connect first client and check it is alive:
  218:     C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  219:                                                    {save_accepted_host, false},
  220:                                               {user_interaction, false},
  221:                                               {user, ?USER},
  222:                                               {password, ?PASSWD},
  223:                                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  224:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  225: 
  226:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  227: 
  228:     %% Make acceptor restart:
  229:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [AccPid]),
  230:     exit(AccPid, kill),
  231:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(AccPid)),
  232: 
  233:     %% Check it is a new acceptor and wait if it is not:
  234:     ?wait_match({ok,[{AccPid1,ListenAddr,Port}]}, AccPid1=/=AccPid,
  235:                 acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  236:                 AccPid1,
  237:                 500, 30),
  238: 
  239:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []),
  240: 
  241:     true = (AccPid1 =/= AccPid2),
  242: 
  243:     %% Connect second client and check it is alive:
  244:     C2 =
  245:         case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  246:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  247:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  248:                                              {user, ?USER},
  249:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  250:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]) of
  251:             {ok,_C2} ->
  252:                 _C2;
  253:             _Other ->
  254:                 ct:log("new connect failed: ~p~n~n~s",[_Other,lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  255:                 ct:fail("Re-connect failed!", [])
  256:         end,
  257: 
  258:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  259: 
  260:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  261: 
  262:     %% Check first client is still alive:
  263:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  264: 
  265:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid2),
  266:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid2), 1000, 30),
  267:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  268:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  269: 
  270:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid),
  271:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid), 1000, 30),
  272:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]), 1000, 5),
  273:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]), 1000, 5).
  274: 
  275: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  276: shell_channel_tree(Config) ->
  277:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  278:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  279:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  280:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  281:     TimeoutShell =
  282:         fun() ->
  283:                 io:format("TimeoutShell started!~n",[]),
  284:                 timer:sleep(5000),
  285:                 ct:log("~p TIMEOUT!",[self()])
  286:         end,
  287:     {Daemon, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  288:                                                 {user_dir, UserDir},
  289:                                                 {password, "morot"},
  290:                                                 {shell, fun(_User) ->
  291:                                                                 spawn(TimeoutShell)
  292:                                                         end
  293:                                                 }
  294:                                             ]),
  295:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  296: 						      {user, "foo"},
  297: 						      {password, "morot"},
  298: 						      {user_interaction, true},
  299: 						      {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  300: 
  301:     [ConnectionSup,_ChPid|_] = Sups0 = chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  302: 
  303:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  304:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef,ChannelId0),
  305:     success = ssh_connection:ptty_alloc(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0, [{pty_opts,[{onlcr,1}]}]),
  306: 
  307:     ?wait_match([{_,_, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  308:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  309:                  {connection,_,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  310:                 ],
  311: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  312:                 [ChSup]),
  313:     ?wait_match([{_,GroupPid,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}
  314:                 ],
  315:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  316:                 [GroupPid]),
  317: 
  318: 
  319:     {links,GroupLinks} = erlang:process_info(GroupPid, links),
  320:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, GroupLinks = ~p Sups0 = ~p",[GroupPid,GroupLinks,Sups0]),
  321:     [ShellPid] = GroupLinks--[ChSup],
  322:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, ShellPid = ~p",[GroupPid,ShellPid]),
  323: 
  324:     receive
  325:         {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"TimeoutShell started!",Rest/binary>>}} ->
  326:             ct:log("TimeoutShell started. Rest = ~p", [Rest]),
  327:             receive
  328:                 %%---- wait for the connection to terminate
  329:                 {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef,{closed,ChannelId0}} ->
  330:                     ct:log("Connection terminated",[]),
  331:                     case {chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  332:                           process_info(GroupPid),
  333:                           process_info(ShellPid)} of
  334:                         {Sups0, undefined, undefined} ->
  335:                             %% SUCCESS
  336:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon);
  337:                         {Sups0, _, undefined}  ->
  338:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  339:                             ct:fail("Group proc lives!");
  340:                         {Sups0, undefined, _}  ->
  341:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  342:                             ct:fail("Shell proc lives!");
  343:                         _ ->
  344:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  345:                             ct:fail("Sup tree changed!")
  346:                     end
  347:             after 10000 ->
  348:                     ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  349:                     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  350:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  351:                     ct:fail("CLI Timeout 1")
  352:             end
  353:     after 10000 ->
  354:             ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  355:             ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  356:             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  357:             ct:fail("CLI Timeout 2")
  358:     end.
  359: 
  360: chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon) ->
  361:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup),
  362: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)
  363:                 ],
  364: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  365:                 [ConnectionSup,AccSup]),
  366:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  367:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  368:                  {connection,ServerConnPid,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  369:                 ],
  370: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  371: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup,ServerConnPid]),
  372:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  373:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  374:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)],
  375:                 supervisor:which_children(AccSup),
  376:                 []),
  377:     [ConnectionSup, ChSup, ServerConnPid, AccSup, FwdAccSup].
  378: 
  379: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  380: %% Help functions
  381: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  382: check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, Host, Port, Config) ->
  383:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  384:     ClientConn = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  385:                                                    {user_interaction, false},
  386:                                                    {user, ?USER},
  387:                                                    {password, ?PASSWD},
  388:                                                    {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  389:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup),
  390: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)],
  391: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  392:                 [ConnectionSup,AccSup]),
  393:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  394:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  395:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  396: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  397: 		[FwdAccSup,ServerConn]),
  398:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  399:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)], supervisor:which_children(AccSup)),
  400:     {ok,PidC} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ClientConn),
  401:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  402:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  403:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  404: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  405: 		[ChSup,ServerConn]),
  406: 
  407:     ?wait_match([{_,PidS,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}],
  408:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  409:                 [PidS]),
  410:     true = (PidS =/= PidC),
  411:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  412:     ssh:close(ClientConn).
  413: 
  414: 
  415: check_sshc_system_tree(ConnectionSup, Connection, _Config) ->
  416:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup)],
  417:                 supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup),
  418:                 [ConnectionSup]),
  419:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  420:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  421:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  422:                 ],
  423: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  424: 		[FwdAccSup]),
  425:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  426: 
  427:     {ok,ChPid1} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  428:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  429:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  430:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  431:                 ],
  432: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  433: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  434: 
  435:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  436:                 ],
  437:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  438:                 [ChPid1]),
  439: 
  440:     {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  441:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  442:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  443:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  444:                 ],
  445: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  446: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  447: 
  448:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]},
  449:                  {_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  450:                 ],
  451:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  452:                 [ChPid1,ChPid2]),
  453: 
  454:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid1]),
  455:     exit(ChPid1, kill),
  456:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  457:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  458:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  459:                 ],
  460: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  461: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  462: 
  463:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  464:                 ],
  465:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  466:                 [ChPid2]),
  467: 
  468:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid2]),
  469:     exit(ChPid2, kill),
  470:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  471:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  472:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  473:                 ],
  474: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  475: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  476: 
  477:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  478: 
  479:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []).
  480: 
  481: 
  482: 
  483: acceptor_pid(DaemonPid) ->
  484:     Parent = self(),
  485:     Pid = spawn(fun() ->
  486:                         Parent ! {self(), supsearch,
  487:                                   [{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}
  488: 
  489:                                    || ?SYSTEM_SUP(DPid,#address{address=ListenAddr,port=Port,profile=NS})
  490:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  491:                                       DPid == DaemonPid,
  492: 
  493:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSupPid,_)
  494:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(DaemonPid),
  495: 
  496:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(AccPid, #address{address=L2,
  497:                                                                         port=P2,
  498:                                                                         profile=NS2})
  499:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(AccSupPid),
  500:                                       L2 == ListenAddr,
  501:                                       P2 == Port,
  502:                                       NS2 == NS]}
  503:                 end),
  504:     receive {Pid, supsearch, L} -> {ok,L}
  505:     after 2000 -> timeout
  506:     end.
  507: 
  508: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  509: flush_rest() -> lists:reverse(flush_rest([])).
  510: 
  511: flush_rest(Acc) ->
  512:     receive Any -> [Any|Acc]
  513:     after 0 -> Acc
  514:     end.
